attributes.action: Insist that Inset or Teacher Training days be done out of term time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are so many complaints about the standard of children’s education, and the like, which would lead to the assumption that it is better to allocate all 'in-term' time to children.

Every term 1 to 3 days are lost due to the staff using our children’s time to 'paint walls'.  Make these activities in the extended holidays mandatory and teach when school would/should be open.  Use to be called ‘Baker days’ after the minister who came up with the idiotic idea.

This would also ease the burden on parents by not making them find extra childcare or take time off after a 6 week holiday; this making the stats better and the economy stronger.
